com.cz.library.widget

Class OptionGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.LinearLayout
          • android.widget.RadioGroup
            • com.cz.library.widget.OptionGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class OptionGroup
extends android.widget.RadioGroup
    控件组,可自定义外圈选中样式 update 2014/11/5 重构代码, 1:将外观改为用颜色值用代码生成,非drawalbe目录下shspe生成. 2:新增滑块移动动画,难点距边缘时自动圆角化

    Created by cz on 2014/5/16
